Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Texas in 1965...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1966, off Joe Bonikowski (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/27/1966, off Ralph Terry (DET)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Cleveland on 5/21/1966...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Chicago (A) on 7/25/1966...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1966, hitting .414 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1967, hitting .386 with 4 HR, 22 RBI...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/1/1968 with a Broken Finger, out for 6-7 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/1/1972 to a 3-year deal worth $6,750,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Chicago (A) on 6/5/1972...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/2/1975 to a 3-year deal worth $2,150,500 per year...
